skillRows.name: Blade Downpour
skillRows.description:
ELF has two Basic ATKs:
Basic ATK 1: Launch two water projectiles each dealing 240% ATK of Ice DMG.
Basic ATK 2: Swing the sword to emit a marching wave dealing 480% ATK of Ice DMG.
ATK Interval: 3.3s

skillRows.name: Pending Rain
skillRows.description: ELF restores 2.2 SP per second in battle.

skillRows.name: Imminent Storm
skillRows.description: ELF's Basic ATKs deal 30.0% bonus Total DMG.

skillRows.name: Purge of Evil
skillRows.description:
Channel a formation to gather enemies in a large area dealing 800% + 5 x 100% + 800% ATK of Ice DMG over 7s. Enemies within become Sunken and take 10.0% bonus Ice DMG until the formation ends.
Dealing over 500 Ice DMG to enemies within the formation enhances the gathering for 1s. CD: 1s.
CD: 30s
SP: 75

skillRows.name: Refreshing Dew
skillRows.description: When the formation ends, enemies still within stay Sunken for 6.0s longer.

skillRows.name: Tainted Heart
skillRows.description: Sunken enemies take 6.0% further bonus Ice DMG.

skillRows.name: Clairvoyance
skillRows.description: ELF's Ultimate deals 30.0% bonus Total DMG.

skillRows.name: Shoreless
skillRows.description: [Team] With one or more Ice DMG dealers on the team, Sunken enemies take 8.0% bonus Ice DMG.

skillRows.name: Traceless
skillRows.description: [Team] With two or more Ice DMG dealers on the team, the Sunken status lasts for 3.0s longer additionally after the formation ends.

skillRows.name: Water's Bane
skillRows.description: When a QTE hits, ELF launches a blade wave dealing 800.0% ATK of Ice DMG to enemies on its path. CD: 10s.

skillRows.name: Roaring Tides
skillRows.description: ELF's Joint ATKs deal 30.0% bonus Ice DMG.
